executive_summary.problem_statement: Users currently experience friction during authentication due to lack of modern sign-in options, leading to 15% cart abandonment and 8% user churn at the login step.
executive_summary.proposed_solution: Implement a modern, secure authentication system supporting OAuth2/OIDC, MFA, and passwordless authentication options while maintaining enterprise-grade security and multi-tenancy support.
expected_outcomes: Decrease user churn at authentication by 60%
executive_summary.target_audience: B2B SaaS customers and their end-users across multiple tenant organizations
executive_summary.value_proposition: Secure, frictionless authentication that increases conversion while meeting enterprise compliance requirements

business_objectives.description: Increase customer conversion rate by reducing authentication friction
business_objectives.rationale: Authentication is the first touchpoint; a poor experience impacts overall customer satisfaction
business_objectives.aligned_with: Company OKR: Improve customer acquisition by 25%

business_objectives.description: Enable enterprise sales by achieving SOC 2 compliance
business_objectives.rationale: Enterprise customers require SOC 2 compliance for vendor approval
business_objectives.aligned_with: Company OKR: Expand enterprise market segment

product_goals.rationale: Industry standard for secure delegated authentication

success_metrics.name: Authentication Success Rate
success_metrics.description: Percentage of authentication attempts that succeed

success_metrics.name: Login Time
success_metrics.description: Time from login initiation to successful authentication

success_metrics.name: MFA Adoption
success_metrics.description: Percentage of users with MFA enabled

personas.name: Admin Alice
personas.description: IT administrator responsible for managing user access, security policies, and compliance for their organization
goals: Enforce security policies across the organization
Monitor authentication activity for security threats
pain_points: Lack of visibility into authentication failures
Difficulty enforcing MFA across all users
No centralized audit logs for compliance
behaviors: Manages user access through admin console
personas.quote: I need to balance security with user experience - too strict and users complain, too loose and we're at risk.

personas.name: End-user Emma
personas.description: Regular user who needs quick, reliable access to the application to do their daily work
goals: Access the app from any device
Feel confident their account is secure
behaviors: Uses the app multiple times daily
personas.quote: I just want to get into the app and do my work - authentication should be invisible.

user_stories.title: Social Login
user_stories.i_want: to sign in using my Google or Microsoft account
user_stories.so_that: I don't need to remember another password

acceptance_criteria.description: User can authenticate via Google OAuth
acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the login page
acceptance_criteria.then: User is redirected to Google, authenticates, and returns logged in

acceptance_criteria.description: User can authenticate via Microsoft OAuth
acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the login page
acceptance_criteria.then: User is redirected to Microsoft, authenticates, and returns logged in

user_stories.title: MFA Setup
user_stories.i_want: to set up MFA using an authenticator app

acceptance_criteria.when: User initiates MFA setup and scans QR code
acceptance_criteria.then: TOTP is configured and user can verify with a code

user_stories.title: Enforce MFA Policy
user_stories.i_want: to require MFA for all users in my organization
user_stories.so_that: I can meet security compliance requirements

acceptance_criteria.description: Admin can enable org-wide MFA requirement
acceptance_criteria.given: Admin is in organization security settings
acceptance_criteria.then: All users must set up MFA on next login

user_stories.title: Passwordless Login
user_stories.i_want: to sign in using a magic link sent to my email
user_stories.so_that: I don't need to remember a password

acceptance_criteria.when: User enters email and clicks 'Send magic link'
acceptance_criteria.then: User receives email with secure login link valid for 15 minutes

functional.title: OAuth2/OIDC Provider Support
functional.description: System shall support authentication via OAuth2/OIDC providers including Google, Microsoft, and custom SAML providers

functional.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
functional.description: System shall support TOTP-based MFA with optional SMS and email backup codes

acceptance_criteria.description: Support TOTP authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy)

functional.title: Passwordless Authentication
functional.description: System shall support passwordless authentication via magic links and WebAuthn/passkeys

acceptance_criteria.description: Support magic link authentication via email

non_functional.title: Authentication Latency
non_functional.description: Authentication requests must complete within acceptable latency bounds

non_functional.title: Service Availability
non_functional.description: Authentication service must maintain high availability

non_functional.title: Authentication Security
non_functional.description: Authentication system must meet enterprise security standards

non_functional.title: Tenant Isolation
non_functional.description: Each tenant's authentication data must be isolated from other tenants

non_functional.title: Authentication Observability
non_functional.description: Full observability into authentication flows for debugging and security monitoring
non_functional.target: 100% of auth flows traced, structured logging

non_functional.title: Authentication Throughput
non_functional.description: System must scale to handle peak authentication loads

non_functional.title: Authentication Recovery
non_functional.description: Authentication service must have disaster recovery capabilities

non_functional.title: Regulatory Compliance
non_functional.description: Authentication system must comply with relevant regulations
non_functional.target: SOC 2 Type II certified, GDPR compliant

phases.name: Foundation
success_criteria: OAuth2 login functional with Google and Microsoft
TOTP MFA enrollment and verification working

assumptions.description: Users have access to email for passwordless authentication
assumptions.rationale: Magic link authentication requires email access
assumptions.risk: Users without email access cannot use passwordless option

assumptions.description: Third-party OAuth providers maintain their SLAs
assumptions.rationale: We depend on Google/Microsoft for OAuth
assumptions.risk: OAuth provider outages affect our availability

constraints.description: Must comply with GDPR for EU users
Must maintain backward compatibility with existing auth API

dependencies.name: Identity Provider Team
dependencies.description: IdP team must provide SCIM provisioning API

out_of_scope: User profile management (handled by separate service)

risks.description: OAuth provider API changes could break integration
risks.mitigation: Monitor provider changelogs, maintain integration tests

risks.description: MFA adoption may be lower than expected
risks.mitigation: User education campaign, streamlined enrollment UX

Algorithm generating one-time passwords based on current time and shared secret
Target value for a service level that is measured by a service level indicator
